title: Drawing, "Design for Citibank/Citicorp Logo", ca. 1975
medium: Black marker, graphite, and tape on white tracing paper
description: Four-pointed star shape constructed by the negative space left by a series of black lines drawn to create illusion of opening rectangular forms. These forms extend beyond black-bordered circle which partially frames the design.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Citibank/Citicorp Logo", ca. 1975.
ca. 1975. Black marker, graphite, and tape on white tracing paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-18.
